Generation VI.X: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VI.Y: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon gets worked up easily. Its body can also overheat, so it uses its ears to dissipate the heat and calm down.
Generation IX.Violet: Twigs make for Fennekin’s snacks. When it nibbles on twigs, it finds the courage to face strong foes.

Generation VI.X: First partner Pokémon from Tierno in Aquacorde Town Traded from Shauna in Vaniville Town after becoming Champion if the player chose Froakie
Generation VI.Y: First partner Pokémon from Tierno in Aquacorde Town Traded from Shauna in Vaniville Town after becoming Champion if the player chose Froakie

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Savanna Biome (after boosting biodiversity in the Savanna Biome)
